definition: melodies of the elite in the state of Chu 楚國|楚国[Chu3 guo2]/highbrow art and literature

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean

sentences.english: China Beijing Zoo, spring snow in March. Wolf. Photo by KaKa.
sentences.chinese: 中国北京动物园，在三月阳春白雪。

sentences.english: Though more popular than it used to be, this opera is still caviar to the general.
sentences.chinese: 这出歌剧虽然比过去通俗些，但仍是阳春白雪。

sentences.english: Many of the writer's books are considered caviar to the general public.
sentences.chinese: 这位作家的许多作品被认为是阳春白雪，读者很少。

sentences.english: China Beijing Zoo, spring snow in March. Bear. Photo by KaKa.
sentences.chinese: 中国北京动物园，在三月阳春白雪。

definition: folk songs of the state of Chu 楚國|楚国[Chu3 guo2]/popular art forms (cf. 陽春白雪|阳春白雪[yang2 chun1 bai2 xue3], highbrow art forms)
can be enjoyed by scholars and lay-people alike (idiom)
(of an uneducated person) to mingle with the cognoscenti/to pose as a culture lover/to be a culture snob/having pretensions to culture
to cater to the public's taste/kitsch/commercial
lit. not eating the food of common mortals/fig. placing oneself above the common populace
pinyin: bu4 shi2 ren2 jian1 yan1 huo3
